snippet: DBS Group Holdings of Singapore agreed on Monday to buy Bank Danamon of Indonesia for $7.2 billion in one of the largest takeovers in Southeast Asia's financial services industry.
abstract: DBS Group Holdings of Singapore agreed on Monday to buy Bank Danamon of Indonesia for $7.2 billion in one of the largest takeovers in Southeast Asia's financial services industry.

headline.main: DBS Group to Buy Bank Danamon for $7.2 Billion
